```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```


Load all the necessary files
```{r}

nhlreg = read.csv("./data/NHL Regular Total.csv",header = TRUE, stringsAsFactors = FALSE)

str(nhlreg)


```



```{r}
# Regular season table ready for use
nhlreg2 <- nhlreg[,0:204]

```



Table to be included in Regular Season tab
```{r}

regtbl = nhlreg2 %>% select(
    .,
    'DftYr',
    'Age',
    'Seasons',
    'H.Ref.Name',
    'Team',
    'GP',
    'G',
    'A',
    'CPP',
    'CriG',
    'CruG',
    'CruA1',
    'CruA2'
)


regtbl$Team <- as.character(regtbl$Team)

str(regtbl)

regtbl %>% mutate(., Team = lapply(regtbl$Team, function(x) strsplit(x,','),`[`,2]))


```
